function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of SARS-CoV-2 contamination on metal surfaces","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of metal surfaces and implementation of touchless solutions","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection, self-disinfecting surfaces","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Viral titre measurement and assay procedure may pose a risk of exposure to lab personnel","Impact":"Potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2 during the assay process","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, gloveboxes, containment systems","People":"Lab personnel, researchers","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers"},{"Description":"Copper coating application process may pose a risk to workers","Impact":"Potential exposure to copper particles and associated health risks","Mitigation":"Proper training, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), ventilation systems","Technologies":"Effective ventilation systems, respiratory protective equipment","People":"Workers involved in the coating process","Owner":"Employers, workplace safety authorities"}]}
